title: tiruvoTriyoor tyaagaraajan (padam)
sahitya:
tiruvoTriyUr tyAgarAjan chidvilAsa nAthanaDi

(tiruvoTriyUr)



anupallavi



paruvattilE avar pAdamE paNindadallAl onrariyEn

uruvattilE avarai kaNDa pin OhO nAn enna sheivEn

(tiruvoTriyUr)



caraNam



pArtta kaNgaL pArttadu pOl pArttaviDamellAm enakku

tOnrudaDi sakhiyE tOghaiyE oru vazhi shollaDi

AttirattAl manam padari AshaiyAgi mei melindEn

tOttiram sheidu avarkkum enakkum tondam viDAmal shei sukIrtamuNDu

(tirvoTriyUr)
